name: Tom Holkenborg
description:
'''Tom Holkenborg''' (born 8 December 1967), also known as '''Junkie XL''', is a Dutch composer, multi-instrumentalist, DJ, producer, and engineer. Originally known for his trance productions, he has moved to producing electronica and [[big beat]] music and film scores. His remix of [[Elvis Presley]]'s "[[A Little Less Conversation#Junkie XL / JXL remix|A Little Less Conversation]]" became a worldwide hit in 2002.

In film scores, he has worked with [[Hans Zimmer]] and his company [[Remote Control Productions (American company)|Remote Control Productions]] on ''[[Batman v Superman: Dawn of Justice]]'', as well as composing the scores for ''[[Zack Snyder's Justice League]]'', ''[[Divergent (film)|Divergent]]'', ''[[Mad Max: Fury Road]]'', ''[[Deadpool (film)|Deadpool]]'', ''[[Tomb Raider (film)|Tomb Raider]]'', ''[[Alita: Battle Angel]]'', ''[[Terminator: Dark Fate]]'', ''[[Sonic the Hedgehog (film)|Sonic the Hedgehog]]'', ''[[Scoob!]]'', ''[[Godzilla vs. Kong]]'', ''[[Army of the Dead]]'', ''[[Sonic the Hedgehog 2 (film)|Sonic the Hedgehog 2]]'', ''[[Three Thousand Years of Longing]]'', ''[[Rebel Moon]]'', ''[[Godzilla x Kong: The New Empire]]'', ''[[Rebel Moon â€“ Part Two: The Scargiver]]'', ''[[Furiosa: A Mad Max Saga]]'' and ''[[Sonic the Hedgehog 3 (film)|Sonic the Hedgehog 3]].
